description:
The founders of the http://anidb.net/ch1738 [Crossbone Vanguard] and http://anidb.net/ch1752 [Cosmo Babylonia], whose original family name was Buch. Having made a fortune in the salvage business, family patriarch Scharnhorst Buch purchased the Ronah name in U.C. 0068 to suit his aristocratic ambitions. For a family that believed itself truly superior to the common masses who polluted the Earth sphere, this act seemed like a suitable way to distinguish itself.
In addition to the business empire known as the http://anidb.net/ch1751 [Buch Concern], the Ronah family has also held important positions in the Earth Federation Assembly and the Colony Public Corporation, allowing it to advance its own grand plans. In U.C. 0123, the Ronah family uses its private army, the http://anidb.net/ch1738 [Crossbone Vanguard], to seize the Frontier Side and found the nation of http://anidb.net/ch1752 [Cosmo Babylonia].
name: Meika Ronah
